nodes.description: Evaluate the expression log10(45) + cos(0.9) * sin(0.2) + e^2 using Python.

code_variants.CODE_0C:
import math

log_val = math.log10(45)
cos_val = math.cos(0.9)
sin_val = math.sin(0.2)
exp_val = math.exp(2)
result = log_val + cos_val * sin_val + exp_val

return {"numerical_result_0C": result}

nodes.description: Evaluate the expression log10(45) + cos(0.9) * sin(0.2) + e^2 using Python.

code_variants.CODE_0C:
import math

log_val = math.log10(45)
cos_val = math.cos(0.9)
sin_val = math.sin(0.2)
exp_val = math.exp(2)
result = log_val + cos_val * sin_val + exp_val

return {"numerical_result_0C": result}
